Body:
mocker.patch.object(requests.Session, 'send', side_effect=error_class)
request_handler = RequestHandler('a', 'b', 'https://localhost', 'default', 
    10, 30)
with pytest.raises(FineractException):
    request_handler.make_request('get', '')
pytest.mark.parametrize('error_class', [requests.ConnectionError, requests.
    ConnectTimeout, AttributeError])
